song_name: Never in My Arms Always in My Heart
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Never in My Arms Always in My Heart has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Chord-Melody Tension and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Never in My Arms Always in My Heart has sections analyzed in the following keys: F Major,  and C Major.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
